content: And that's not to say that we're comfortable with the stock valuation because we think that we should get a higher valuation on a PE basis based on our strong performance, but we're just not prone to rush out and repurchase the stock and that kind of a environment doesn't mean to say that we wouldn't, but we don't have any pre-determined belief that we should really jump out there and really try to be eager and anticipate that we're buying stock really cheap because of the PE multiple.
